resources.string: Magnus enters with quiet strength, his massive frame and the echo of clinking metal announcing his arrival, the weight of craftsmanship evident in his powerful yet careful movements. A mug of your strongest brew, something that embodies the resilience of forged steel.

string-array.name: player_magnus
string-array.item: A drink as sturdy as the metal you forge. May it offer a moment\'s respite from the heat of the forge.
Strong ale for a strong day, but watch out, it might forge its own way out of the tankard!
A smith seeking a drink as strong as his craftsmanship. Maybe my company could add a different kind of strength?
